page.title: 19Wilsthorpe village.
page.content: The farmer in Wilsthorpe has 25 acres of arable land and 48 acres of pasture.He has 70 pigs and 45 cowHe sends the cows to the slaughter house and his pigs to a co-operative in Leicester.The are 18 houses in the village all together so it is very small.Six of the houses are farm Houses and there is are some kennels.In the village there is a small church.The farmer is a church warden and parish councillor for Braceborough and Wilsthorpe.There are 5 parish councillors all together.There is a telephone kiosk and a post box.There used to be some water works but that has not been used since Rutand Water was opened.The farmer has lived here for 28 years and does not wish to go anywhere else.Wilsthorpe has an annual horse show and a festival this year.
